briefTitle: COVID-19 Health Messaging to Underserved Communities
officialTitle: COVID-19 Health Messaging to Underserved Communities

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

eligibilityCriteria.criteria: Inclusion Criteria: Hispanic and African-American adult individuals, men and women - oversample of those with less completed education Exclusion Criteria: children, those who do not identify as above

primary.measure: Incidence Rate for Knowledge Gaps: Control vs. Any Intervention
primary.description: Incidence rate for knowledge gaps is the count of knowledge gaps divided by the maximum possible count: 7
primary.timeFrame: The outcome was measured immediately following the intervention in the 15-minute baseline survey.

primary.measure: Incidence Rate for Information-seeking Behavior: Control vs. Any Intervention
primary.description: Incidence rate for Information-seeking behavior is the count of links demanded divided by the maximum possible count: 10
primary.timeFrame: The outcome was measured immediately following the intervention in the 15-minute baseline survey.

primary.measure: Incidence Rate for Knowledge Gaps by Intervention
primary.description: Incidence rate for knowledge gaps is the count of knowledge gaps divided by the maximum possible count: 7
primary.timeFrame: The outcome was measured immediately following the intervention in the 15-minute baseline survey.

primary.measure: Incidence Rate for Information-seeking Behavior by Intervention
primary.description: Incidence rate for Information-seeking behavior is the count of links demanded divided by the maximum possible count: 10
primary.timeFrame: The outcome was measured immediately following the intervention in the 15-minute baseline survey.
